middlewares.not-unique: Can only have one of this type of middleware

game-modes-meta.too-few: Must have at least one game mode

game-modes.name-id-invalid: Invalid name (only A-Z, 0-9, and - are allowed)
game-modes.name-not-unique: Game mode name is not unique

max-players.too-low: General player count cannot be below 0
max-players.too-high: General player count cannot be above 32

max-players-direct.too-low: Direct player count cannot be below 0
max-players-direct.too-high: Direct player count cannot be above 32

max-players-party.too-low: Party player count cannot be below 0
max-players-party.too-high: Party player count cannot be above 32

idle-lobbies.min-gt-max: Minimum must be less than or equal to the maximum
idle-lobbies.min-too-high: Cannot have more than 16 min idle lobbies
idle-lobbies.max-too-high: Cannot have more than 32 max idle lobbies

ports.range-min-gt-max: Range minimum must be less than or equal to the maximum
ports.port-out-of-range: Host network port must be within 26000 and 31999
ports.needs-game-guard: HTTP/HTTPS ports require proxy to be set to Game Guard
ports.unsupported-target-port: Host networks do not support a target port, use port range instead
ports.unsupported-port-range: Game Guard network does not support port range
ports.duplicate-port-and-port-range: Cannot declare both port and port range
ports.needs-host-network: Ports without Game Gaurd require network mode to be set to host

key.too-long: Env var name is too long
key.not-unique: Env var key is not unique

value.too-long: Env var value is too long

custom-display-names-meta.too-few: Must have at least one display name

name-id.not-unique: Namespace name id is already taken

display-name.too-short: Game display name is too short
display-name.too-long: Game display name is too long

name-id.not-unique: Game name ID is already taken
name-id.too-short: Game name ID is too short
name-id.too-long: Game name ID is too long

ports.range-min-gt-max: Range minimum must be less than or equal to the maximum
ports.unsupported-port-range: HTTP & HTTPS & TCP+TLS does not support port range
ports.duplicate-port-and-port-range: Cannot declare both port and port range
